00269 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00270 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &i,
00271     bool force_thread_safety)
00272 {
00273     if (Nothrow) {
00274         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00275             data = i.data;
00276             if (!data.is_nan()) {
00277                 if (force_thread_safety || Threadsafe == true)
00278                     data.make_unique();
00279             }
00280         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00281             data.make_nan();
00282         }
00283     } else {
00284         data = i.data;
00285         if (force_thread_safety || Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00286     }
00287 }

00290 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00291 template <typename charT>
00292 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const charT *str, std::size_t base) {
00293     if (Nothrow) {
00294         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00295             const std::basic_string<charT> &tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00296             if (str[0] == tnan[0] && std::basic_string<charT>(str) == tnan) {
00297                 data.make_nan();
00298             } else {
00299                 data.from_string(str, base);
00300                 if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00301             }
00302         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00303             data.make_nan();
00304         }
00305     } else {
00306         data.from_string(str, base);
00307         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00308     }
00309 }
00310 
00339 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00340 template <typename charT>
00341 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const charT *str, const charT *&endptr,
00342     std::size_t base)
00343 {
00344     if (Nothrow) {
00345         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00346             const std::basic_string<charT> &tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00347             if (str[0] == tnan[0]) {
00348                 std::basic_string<charT> s(str);
00349                 if (s.substr(0, tnan.length()) == tnan) {
00350                     data.make_nan();
00351                     endptr = str + tnan.length();
00352                     return;
00353                 }
00354             }
00355             data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00356             if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00357         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00358             data.make_nan();
00359         }
00360     } else {
00361         data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00362         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00363     }
00364 }

00390 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00391 template <typename charT, typename traitsT, typename allocT>
00392 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const std::basic_string<charT, traitsT,
00393     allocT> &str, std::size_t base)
00394 {
00395     if (Nothrow) {
00396         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00397             if (str == detail::nan_text<charT>()) data.make_nan();
00398             else {
00399                 data.from_string(str, base);
00400                 if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00401             }
00402         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00403             data.make_nan();
00404         }
00405     } else {
00406         data.from_string(str, base);
00407         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00408     }
00409 }

00432 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00433 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const xint::binary_t &i, bitsize_t
00434     bits)
00435 {
00436     if (Nothrow) {
00437         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00438             data.from_binary(i, bits);
00439         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00440             data.make_nan();
00441         }
00442     } else {
00443         data.from_binary(i, bits);
00444     }
00445 }

00459 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00460 template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_BPARAMS>
00461 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_BPARAMS> &i,
00462     bool force_thread_safety)
00463 {
00464     if (Nothrow) {
00465         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00466             if (i.is_nan()) {
00467                 data.make_nan();
00468             } else {
00469                 data = i._data();
00470                 if (!data.is_nan()) {
00471                     if (force_thread_safety || Threadsafe == true)
00472                         data.make_unique();
00473                     if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00474                 }
00475             }
00476         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00477             data.make_nan();
00478         }
00479     } else {
00480         if (i._data().is_nan()) detail::exception_handler<>::call(__FILE__,
00481             __LINE__, exceptions::not_a_number());
00482         data = i._data();
00483         if (force_thread_safety || Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00484         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00485     }
00486 }

00500 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00501 template <typename Type> integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::integer_t(const Type n,
00502     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*)
00503 {
00504     if (Nothrow) {
00505         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00506             if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) {
00507                 data.set_signed(n);
00508                 if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00509             } else data.set_unsigned(n);
00510         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00511             data.make_nan();
00512         }
00513     } else {
00514         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) {
00515             data.set_signed(n);
00516             if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00517         } else data.set_unsigned(n);
00518     }
00519 }
00520 
00521 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00522 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>& integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::
00523     operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00524 {
00525     if (Nothrow) {
00526         if (c._data().is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00527         else {
00528             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00529                 data = c.data;
00530                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00531             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00532                 data.make_nan();
00533             }
00534         }
00535     } else {
00536         data = c.data;
00537         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00538     }
00539     return *this;
00540 }

00569 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00570 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator-() const {
00571     if (Nothrow) {
00572         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00573         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00574             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(*this);
00575             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00576             r.data = -r.data;
00577             if (!Signed && r.data.negative) r._fix_negative_unsigned();
00578             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00579         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00580             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
00581         }
00582     } else {
00583         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(*this);
00584         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00585         r.data = -r.data;
00586         if (!Signed && r.data.negative) r._fix_negative_unsigned();
00587         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00588     }
00589 }

00592 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00593 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>& integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator+=(const
00594     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &b)
00595 {
00596     if (Nothrow) {
00597         if (b.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00598         if (!is_nan()) {
00599             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00600                 data += b.data;
00601                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00602             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00603                 data.make_nan();
00604             }
00605         }
00606     } else {
00607         data += b.data;
00608         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00609     }
00610     return *this;
00611 }

00713                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();

00729 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00730 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>& integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator--() {
00731     if (Nothrow) {
00732         if (!is_nan()) {
00733             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00734                 --data;
00735                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00736                 if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00737             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00738                 data.make_nan();
00739             }
00740         }
00741     } else {
00742         --data;
00743         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00744         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00745     }
00746     return *this;
00747 }

00756 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00757 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator++(int) {
00758     if (Nothrow) {
00759         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00760         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00761             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data++);
00762             if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00763             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00764         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00765             data.make_nan();
00766         }
00767     } else {
00768         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data++);
00769         if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00770         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00771     }
00772 }

00781 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00782 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator--(int) {
00783     if (Nothrow) {
00784         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00785         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00786             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data--);
00787             if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00788             if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00789             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00790         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00791             data.make_nan();
00792         }
00793     } else {
00794         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data--);
00795         if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00796         if (!Signed && data.negative) _fix_negative_unsigned();
00797         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00798     }
00799 }
00800 
00802 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00803 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>& integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator&=(const
00804     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n)
00805 {
00806     if (Nothrow) {
00807         if (n.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00808         if (!is_nan()) {
00809             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00810                 data &= n.data;
00811                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00812             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00813                 data.make_nan();
00814             }
00815         }
00816     } else {
00817         data &= n.data;
00818         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00819     }
00820     return *this;
00821 }
00822 
00824 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>

00826     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n)
00827 {
00828     if (Nothrow) {
00829         if (n.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00830         if (!is_nan()) {
00831             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00832                 data |= n.data;
00833                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00834             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00835                 data.make_nan();
00836             }
00837         }
00838     } else {
00839         data |= n.data;
00840         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00841     }
00842     return *this;
00843 }

00852         if (!is_nan()) {

00861         data ^= n.data;
00862         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();

00875 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00876 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
00877 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::operator<<(bitsize_t shift) const {
00878     if (Nothrow) {
00879         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00880         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00881             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data << shift);
00882             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00883             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00884         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00885             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
00886         }
00887     } else {
00888         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(data << shift);
00889         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00890         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00891     }
00892 }

01156 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01157 template <class Type>
01158 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::random_by_size(Type
01159     &gen, bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
01160     can_be_negative)
01161 {
01162     if (!Signed) can_be_negative = false;
01163     if (Nothrow) {
01164         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01165             return integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(datatype::random_by_size(gen,
01166                 size_in_bits, high_bit_on, low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
01167         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01168             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01169         }
01170     } else {
01171         return integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(datatype::random_by_size(gen,
01172             size_in_bits, high_bit_on, low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
01173     }
01174 }

01204 template <class Type>
01205 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::random_prime(Type
01206     &gen, bitsize_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback)
01207 {
01208     if (Nothrow) {
01209         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01210             return integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(datatype::random_prime(gen,
01211                 size_in_bits, callback));
01212         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01213             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01214         }
01215     } else {
01216         return integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(datatype::random_prime(gen,
01217             size_in_bits, callback));
01218     }
01219 }

01238 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01239 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> abs(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n) {
01240     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01241         if (n.is_nan())
01242             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01243         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01244             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n._data().abs());
01245             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01246                 r._make_unique();
01247             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01248         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01249             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01250         }
01251     } else {
01252         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n._data().abs());
01253         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01254         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01255     }
01256 }
01257 
01276 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01277 typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::divide_t divide(const
01278     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &dividend, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
01279     &divisor)
01280 {
01281     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01282         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan()) return typename
01283             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::divide_t(detail::get_nan<
01284                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >(), detail::get_nan<
01285                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >());
01286         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01287             typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::datatype::divide_t rr =
01288                 detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01289             typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::divide_t
01290                 r(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(rr.quotient),
01291                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(rr.remainder));
01292             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01293         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01294             return typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::divide_t(
01295                 detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >(),
01296                 detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >());
01297         }
01298     } else {
01299         typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::datatype::divide_t rr =
01300             detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01301         typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::divide_t
01302             r(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(rr.quotient),
01303             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(rr.remainder));
01304         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01305     }
01306 }
01307 
01320 template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01321 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> difference(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
01322     &n1, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2)
01323 {
01324     typename integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::datatype rdata = n1._data() -
01325         n2._data();
01326     rdata.negative = false;
01327     return integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(rdata);
01328 }

01355             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01356                 r._make_unique();
01357             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01358         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01359             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01360         }
01361     } else {
01362         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(detail::square(n._data()));
01363         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01364         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

01376 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01377 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> pow(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n, const
01378     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &e)
01379 {
01380     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01381         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan())
01382             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01383         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01384             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r;
01385             pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01386             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01387                 r._make_unique();
01388             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01389         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01390             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01391         }
01392     } else {
01393         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r;
01394         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01395         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01396         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01397     }
01398 }

01492 template<typename charT, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01493 std::basic_string<charT> to_stringtype(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n,
01494     std::size_t base = 10, bool uppercase = false)
01495 {
01496     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01497         if (n.is_nan()) return detail::nan_text<charT>();
01498         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01499             return detail::to_string<charT>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01500         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01501             return std::basic_string<charT>();
01502         }
01503     } else {
01504         return detail::to_string<charT>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01505     }
01506 }

01730 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01731 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> mulmod(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n,
01732     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &by, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
01733     &modulus)
01734 {
01735     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01736         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return
01737             detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01738         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01739             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01740                 modulus._data()));
01741             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01742                 r._make_unique();
01743             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01744         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01745             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01746         }
01747     } else {
01748         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01749             modulus._data()));
01750         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01751         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01752     }
01753 }
01754 
01769 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01770 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> sqrmod(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n,
01771     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &modulus)
01772 {
01773     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01774         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
01775         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01776             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r = sqrmod(n._data(),
01777                 modulus._data());
01778             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01779                 r._make_unique();
01780             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01781         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01782             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01783         }
01784     } else {
01785         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r = sqrmod(n._data(), modulus._data());
01786         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01787         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01788     }
01789 }
01790 
01814 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01815 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> powmod(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n,
01816     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &exponent, const
01817     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &modulus, bool no_monty = false)
01818 {

01820         if (n.is_nan() || exponent.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return
01821             detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01822         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01823             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(powmod(n._data(), exponent._data(),
01824                 modulus._data(), no_monty));
01825             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
01826                 r._make_unique();
01827             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01828         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01829             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
01830         }
01831     } else {
01832         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(powmod(n._data(), exponent._data(),
01833             modulus._data(), no_monty));
01834         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01835         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01836     }
01837 }

01880 
01920 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
01921 int is_probably_prime(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n, callback_t
01922     callback = no_callback)
01923 {
01924     typedef unsigned int rtype;
01925     typedef boost::mt19937 enginetype;
01926     typedef boost::uniform_int<rtype> dist_t;
01927     typedef boost::variate_generator<enginetype&, dist_t> gen_t;
01928     static std::auto_ptr<enginetype> engine(new
01929         enginetype(boost::uint32_t(time(0) + clock())));
01930     static std::auto_ptr<gen_t> gen(new gen_t(*engine.get(),
01931         dist_t((std::numeric_limits<rtype>::min)(),
01932             (std::numeric_limits<rtype>::max)())));
01933     return is_probably_prime(n, *gen.get(), callback);
01934 }
01935 
01976 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS, typename GenT>
01977 int is_probably_prime(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n, GenT &generator,
01978     callback_t callback = no_callback)
01979 {
01980     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
01981         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
01982         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
01983             return is_probably_prime(n._data(), generator, callback);
01984         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
01985             return -2;
01986         }
01987     } else {
01988         return is_probably_prime(n._data(), generator, callback);
01989     }
01990 }

02000 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> bool operator<(const
02001     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2)
02002 {
02003     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02004         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
02005         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02006             return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
02007         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02008             return false;
02009         }
02010     } else {
02011         return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
02012     }
02013 }

02019         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
02020         BOOST_XINT_TRY {

02105 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02106 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> operator+(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1,
02107     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2)
02108 {
02109     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02110         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan())
02111             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02112         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02113             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n1._data() + n2._data());
02114             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02115         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02116             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02117         }
02118     } else {
02119         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n1._data() + n2._data());
02120         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02121     }
02122 }
02123 
02132 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02133 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> operator-(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1,
02134     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2)
02135 {
02136     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02137         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan())
02138             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02139         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02140             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n1._data() - n2._data());
02141             if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && r._data().negative)
02142                 r._fix_negative_unsigned();
02143             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02144         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02145             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02146         }
02147     } else {
02148         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(n1._data() - n2._data());
02149         if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && r._data().negative)
02150             r._fix_negative_unsigned();
02151         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02152     }
02153 }

02340 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02341 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> gcd(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &num1,
02342     const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &num2)
02343 {
02344     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02345         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02346             detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02347         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02348             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r;
02349             gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02350             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true)
02351                 r._make_unique();
02352             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02353         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02354             return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02355         }
02356     } else {
02357         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r;
02358         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02359         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02360         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02361     }
02362 }

02410 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02411 int compare(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, const
02412     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2, bool ignoresign = false)
02413 {
02414     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02415         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
02416         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02417             return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02418         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02419             return 2;
02420         }
02421     } else {
02422         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02423     }
02424 }
02425 
02442 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02443 std::size_t integer_log2(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n) {
02444     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02445         if (n.is_nan()) return 0;
02446         BOOST_XINT_TRY {
02447             return log2(n._data());
02448         } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
02449             return 0;
02450         }
02451     } else {
02452         return log2(n._data());
02453     }
02454 }
02456 
02458 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op, sub) \
02459     template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS, typename N> \
02460     rtype sub(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, const N n2, typename \
02461         boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<N> >::type* = 0) \
02462     { \
02463         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) { \
02464             BOOST_XINT_TRY { \
02465                 return op(n1, integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n2)); \
02466             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH { \
02467                 return rtype(0); \
02468             } \
02469         } else { \
02470             return op(n1, integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n2)); \
02471         } \
02472     } \
02473     \
02474     template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS, typename N> \
02475     rtype op(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, const N n2) { \
02476         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(sub(n1, n2)); \
02477     } \
02478     \
02479     template <typename N, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> \
02480     rtype sub(const N n1, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2, typename \
02481         boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<N> >::type* = 0) \
02482     { \
02483         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) { \
02484             BOOST_XINT_TRY { \
02485                 return op(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n1), n2); \
02486             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH { \
02487                 return rtype(0); \
02488             } \
02489         } else { \
02490             return op(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n1), n2); \
02491         } \
02492     } \
02493     \
02494     template <typename N, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> \
02495     rtype op(const N n1, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2) { \
02496         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(sub(n1, n2)); \
02497     }
02498 
02499 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<, _sublt)
02500 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>, _subgt)
02501 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=, _suble)
02502 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=, _subge)
02503 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==, _subeq)
02504 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=, _subne)
02505 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare, _subcompare)
02506 
02508 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_MATH(op, sub) \
02509     template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS, typename N> \
02510     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> sub(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, \
02511         const N n2, typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<N> >::type* = \
02512         0) \
02513     { \
02514         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) { \
02515             BOOST_XINT_TRY { \
02516                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(op(n1, \
02517                     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n2))); \
02518                 if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) \
02519                     r._make_unique(); \
02520                 if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && \
02521                     r._data().negative) r._fix_negative_unsigned(); \
02522                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02523             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH { \
02524                 return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >(); \
02525             } \
02526         } else { \
02527             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> r(op(n1, \
02528                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n2))); \
02529             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) \
02530                 r._make_unique(); \
02531             if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && r._data().negative) \
02532                 r._fix_negative_unsigned(); \
02533             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02534         } \
02535     } \
02536     \
02537     template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS, typename N> \
02538     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> op(const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n1, \
02539         const N n2) \
02540     { \
02541         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(sub(n1, n2)); \
02542     } \
02543     \
02544     template <typename N, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> \
02545     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> sub(const N n1, const \
02546         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2, typename \
02547         boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<N> >::type* = 0) \
02548     { \
02549         if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) { \
02550             BOOST_XINT_TRY { \
02551                 integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> \
02552                     r(op(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n1), n2)); \
02553                 if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) \
02554                     r._make_unique(); \
02555                 if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && \
02556                     r._data().negative) r._fix_negative_unsigned(); \
02557                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02558             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH { \
02559                 return detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >(); \
02560             } \
02561         } else { \
02562             integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> \
02563                 r(op(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>(n1), n2)); \
02564             if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe == true) \
02565                 r._make_unique(); \
02566             if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && r._data().negative) \
02567                 r._fix_negative_unsigned(); \
02568             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02569         } \
02570     } \
02571     \
02572     template <typename N, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> \
02573     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> op(const N n1, const \
02574         integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n2) \
02575     { \
02576         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(sub(n1, n2)); \
02577     }

02597 template <typename charT, typename traits, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> inline
02598     std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
02599     traits> &out, const integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n)
02600 {
02601     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow && n.is_nan()) return
02602         operator<<(out, detail::nan_text<charT>());
02603     return operator<<(out, n._data());
02604 }
02605 
02606 template <typename charT, typename traits, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS> inline
02607     std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
02608     traits> &in, integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &n)
02609 {
02610     //if (in.flags() &
02611 
02612     if (integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) {
02613         const std::basic_string<charT> &tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
02614         charT nextchar = charT(in.peek());
02615         if (nextchar == tnan[0]) {
02616             // Must be either #NaN# or an error
02617             std::vector<charT> buffer;
02618 
02619             charT p = 0;
02620             for (std::size_t i = 0; i < tnan.length(); ++i) {
02621                 in >> p;
02622                 buffer.push_back(p);
02623             }
02624             buffer.push_back(0);
02625 
02626             std::basic_string<charT> str(&buffer[0]);
02627             if (str == tnan)
02628                 n = detail::get_nan<integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02629             else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
02630             return in;
02631         }
02632     }
02633     operator>>(in, n._data());
02634     if (!integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed && n._data().negative)
02635         n._fix_negative_unsigned();
02636     return in;
02637 }
02639 
02640 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02641 inline void swap(integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &left,
02642     integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> &right)
02643 {
02644     left._swap(right);
02645 }

02666 template<BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
02667 class numeric_limits<boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> > {
02668     public:
02669     static const bool is_specialized;
02670 
02671     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> min
02672         BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION() throw()
02673     {
02674         if (boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Bits)
02675             return -~(boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>());
02676         else return 0;
02677     }
02678     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> max
02679         BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION() throw()
02680     {
02681         if (boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Bits)
02682             return ~(boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>());
02683         else return 0;
02684     }
02685 
02686     static const int digits;
02687     static const int digits10;
02688     static const bool is_signed;
02689     static const bool is_integer;
02690     static const bool is_exact;
02691     static const int radix;
02692     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> epsilon() throw() { return
02693         0; }
02694     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> round_error() throw() {
02695         return 0; }
02696 
02697     static const int min_exponent; // N/A
02698     static const int min_exponent10; // N/A
02699     static const int max_exponent; // N/A
02700     static const int max_exponent10; // N/A
02701 
02702     static const bool has_infinity; // N/A
02703     static const bool has_quiet_NaN;
02704     static const bool has_signaling_NaN; // N/A
02705     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm; // N/A
02706     static const bool has_denorm_loss; // N/A
02707 
02708     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> infinity() throw() {
02709         return 0; } // N/A
02710     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> quiet_NaN() throw() {
02711         if (boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow) return boost::
02712             xint::detail::get_nan<boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> >();
02713         else return 0;
02714     }
02715     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> signaling_NaN() throw() {
02716         return 0; } // N/A
02717     static boost::xint::integer_t<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> denorm_min() throw() {
02718         return 0; } // N/A
02719

02721     static const bool is_bounded;
02722     static const bool is_modulo;
02723 
02724     static const bool traps; // I assume this means exceptions?
02725     static const bool tinyness_before; // N/A
